text: samipa gnatinta, dilindanta, allahge margaye nikma giyavunta nodena bavata numbala aturin bhagya sampannayin ha vastuva ættan divuriya noyutuya. (ovunata) ovuhu samava detva ! tavada (e gæna)nosalaka haritva! allah numbalata samava dima gæna numbala priya nokarannehu da? tavada allah atiksamasiliya. maha karunanvitaya
